channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What We Know About the C.D.C. Shooting in Atlanta
item.description: A gunman who believed the Covid-19 vaccine had made him ill fired at the agency’s Atlanta offices, killing a police officer and rattling the public he...

item.title: Asylum-seekers thought they were following the rules. Now some are told to start over
item.description: NPR has learned that dozens of immigrants across the U.S. have received letters notifying them that their asylum cases have been dismissed because the...

item.title: Zuckerberg’s Compound Had Something That Violated City Code: A Private School
item.description: The school, called BBS, enrolled 14 children in kindergarten through fourth grade and employed three full-time teachers and other staff members.

item.title: Ukraine and Europe Project United Front Ahead of Trump-Putin Summit
item.description: Washington’s push to negotiate an end to the war has raised concerns the Trump administration will make concessions to Moscow that Kyiv cannot accept.

item.title: The Hidden Trauma of Jury Duty
item.description: People who serve on disturbing cases can suffer mental health effects for years after a trial ends.

item.title: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth reposts video of pastors saying women shouldn't vote
item.description: Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth reposted the video profiling Christian Nationalist Pastor Doug Wilson, who opposes same-sex marriage.

item.title: Dmitri Kozak Was a Key Putin Aide. He Lost Power When He Balked at the Ukraine War.

item.title: Ukraine and Europe Project United Front Ahead of Trump-Putin Summit
item.description: Washington’s push to negotiate an end to the war has raised concerns the Trump administration will make concessions to Moscow that Kyiv cannot accept.

item.description: Officials have picked up people across the country, most of them Muslim, citing a national security risk. Rights groups say the raids are targeting de...

item.title: CDC shooter believed COVID vaccine made him suicidal, his father tells police
item.description: The Georgia Bureau of Investigation identified the man who opened fire at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention as Patrick Joseph White. Whit...

item.title: Texas big game hunter killed while stalking African Cape buffalo
item.description: Asher Watkins had been tracking a cape buffalo for the kill when the animal instead turned its attack on the hunter.

item.title: 4 people and 5 months in space, NASA's Crew-10 mission safely returns to Earth
